additionalDocs: Austrian residence certificate (‘Meldebestätigung’) with a registered ‘Hauptwohnsitz’ - if you or your partner live in Austria (this should also be used as proof of address)
Austria.localRequirements:
Before you apply you must have a confirmed date for your ceremony from your registry office (Standesamt) in Austria.  
If you or your partner are legally resident in Austria, the proof of residence must be an Austrian residence certificate (‘Meldebestätigung’) with a registered ‘Hauptwohnsitz’.

additionalDocs: evidence that your partner is free to marry (either a document from their government or their passport showing they're unmarried)

Finland.duration: around 3 months (check with local marriage authorities)
additionalDocs: residence permit card issued by Finnish Immigration Service (or equivalent for the country you live in) – this serves as your proof of address
partner's DVV certificate (this can also be their proof of address)
Finland.localRequirements:
To apply for an affirmation in Finland you must live outside the UK. Upload your residence permit card as your proof of address and bring it to your appointment. If you cannot prove that you are resident outside the UK do not apply for this service.  
If you live in the UK, you'll need to [give notice](https://www.gov.uk/marriages-civil-partnerships/give-notice) at a UK register office to get a certificate of no impediment (CNI). [Follow the guidance for British nationals living in the UK](https://www.gov.uk/marriage-abroad) to find out how to apply.

additionalDocs: photo ID (in addition to your UK passport)

Honduras.localRequirements:
There are no British consular facilities that will issue a CNI in Honduras.  
You will need to travel to the British Embassy Guatemala City in Guatemala to give notice and collect your CNI.

Latvia.localRequirements: Your partner must attend your appointment with you.

additionalDocs: partner's full birth certificate or naturalisation certificate
proof you live in Norway (this should also be your proof of address)
Norway.localRequirements:
Appointments are only available at the British Embassy Oslo. You will need to travel to Oslo for your appointment.  
To apply for an affirmation you must be a resident in Norway. Your proof of address must be issued by a Norwegian Authority. If you cannot prove that you are a Norwegian resident do not apply for this service.  
If you live in the UK, you'll need to [give notice](https://www.gov.uk/marriages-civil-partnerships/give-notice) at a UK register office to get a certificate of no impediment (CNI). [Follow the guidance for British nationals living in the UK](https://www.gov.uk/marriage-abroad) to find out how to apply.

Spain.duration: 3 or 6 months (check with the person conducting your ceremony)
Spain.localRequirements: You should apply for your local CNI 3 months before your civil registry appointment, or your wedding date if you’re holding a religious ceremony first and registering the marriage at the civil registry afterwards.

Suriname.localRequirements:
There are no British consular facilities that will issue a CNI in Suriname. 
You will need to travel to the British High Commission Georgetown in Guyana to give notice and collect your CNI.

additionalDocs: partner's extract from the population register (if they're registered in Sweden)
Sweden.localRequirements:
Only apply for this service if are not registered in the Swedish population register. If you are registered you should not need a CNI to get married. Check with the [Swedish Tax Authorities](https://www.skatteverket.se/privat.4.76a43be412206334b89800052864.html). 
 If you live in the UK you should [apply for a CNI from a UK register office](https://prove-eligibility-foreign-government.forms.fcodev.org.uk/exchange-uk-cni/check-eligibility-and-documents?marriage.country=Sweden) unless you have already travelled to Sweden.

Tanzania.post: British High Commission Dar es Salaam

Russia.duration: 3 to 12 months (check with the person conducting your ceremony)
additionalDocs: Russian spelling of your full name as you want it to appear on your CNI. It needs to be consistent across all the documents you will submit to the local authorities.
Proof of your address while staying in Russia (if you're not a resident)

Vietnam.duration: 3 or 6 months (check with the local People's Committee)

British Consulate General Ho Chi Minh Ci.post: British Consulate General Ho Chi Minh City
